item.description:
EVENT: Join other Mosaic members as we go apple picking at Carver Hill Orchard in Stow where we’ll  have a variety of apples to choose from among them, macintosh, macoun, red delicious, blushing golden and Rome beauties.  After we stroll through the orchard, we have the option of visiting the Farm Store, which features tasty treats such as cider, fudge, peanut brittle and cookies.

Trip’s Coordinator: Nancy nancyrabinowitz@comcast.net

MEET: In the parking lot of the Carver Hill Orchard in Stow, 101 Brookside Ave., Stow, Massachusetts 17775 at noon. Orchard phone:  978-897-6117.

RSVP: Participants should reply before Sunday

COST: One peck (10 pounds), is $12; One bushel (20 pounds), is $20.00 plus $5 which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to get more details and make arrangements to meet

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Apple Picking in Stow MA
